translation.ja: トマシンの年齢と同じ頃 私は こんな夢を見たわ

translation.en: that I was with Christ upon Earth.
translation.ja: イエス様と共にいる夢よ

translation.en: I was so very near him,
translation.ja: 彼の傍らに身を置き―

translation.en: and in many tears for the assurance of the pardon of me sins,
translation.ja: 私は罪が赦された喜びで 涙を流してた

translation.en: and I was so ravished with his love towards me,
translation.ja: 彼の愛に恍惚(こうこつ)となったわ

translation.en: I thought it far exceeding the affection of the kindest husband.
translation.ja: 誰よりも大きな愛だったの

translation.en: And since Samuel disappeared,
translation.ja: サムを失い―

translation.en: I have such a sad weakness of faith. I cannot shake it.
translation.ja: 私は悲しみで 信仰が弱くなった

translation.en: I cannot see Christ's help as near.
translation.ja: イエス様の救いを感じない

translation.en: I pray and I pray, but I cannot...
translation.ja: どんなに祈り続けても…

translation.en: I fear I cannot ever feel that same measure of love again.
translation.ja: あれほどの愛を 受けられないの

translation.en: Thou shalt have of it in heaven.
translation.ja: 天国で受けられる

translation.en: I'll be i'the field.
translation.ja: 作物を探す

translation.en: If you can spare a while, do.
translation.ja: 君の手も借りたい

translation.en: We'll leave at dawn. I promise thee that.
translation.ja: 明日の朝には出発する

translation.en: Jonas, Mercy! Come hither!
translation.ja: ジョナス マーシー

translation.en: Speak not a word.
translation.ja: 黙ってなさいよ

translation.en: Black Phillip is a merry, merry king He rules the land with mirth...
translation.ja: ブラック･フィリップは 　　　　　　　 陽気な王様

translation.en: I cannot abide your songs.
translation.ja: その歌 嫌い

translation.en: Please you, Mercy.
translation.ja: マーシー やめて

translation.en: Black Phillip has a mighty, mighty sting He'll knock thee to the earth
translation.ja: ブラック･フィリップ 　　強い角で お前を倒す

translation.en: Sing baa baa King Phillip the Black sings baa, baa...
translation.ja: フィリップ王の歌を…

translation.en: - Peace, thou thing. - Mercy. Thomasin.
translation.ja: うるさい マーシー トマシン

translation.en: Sing baa baa, King Phillip the Black He'll knock thee on thy back!
translation.ja: ブラック･フィリップが 　　　　　　　 お前を倒す

translation.en: Enough!
translation.ja: やめてよ！

translation.en: Come.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: Get the broad ax and cut off her head.
translation.ja: 斧(おの)で彼女の首をはねろ

translation.en: Get the narrow ax and cut off her head.
translation.ja: 彼女の頭を切り落とせ

translation.en: Get the broad ax and cut off her head.
translation.ja: 斧で彼女の首をはねろ

translation.en: Get the narrow ax and cut off her head.
translation.ja: 彼女の頭を切り落とせ

translation.en: She's upon me! She kneels!
translation.ja: 彼女が僕の上に座ってる

translation.en: My bowels, my stomach,
translation.ja: 僕のはらわたに手を伸ばし

translation.en: she pinches, scratches.
translation.ja: つねって引っかいてる

translation.en: Caleb!
translation.ja: 罪だ

translation.en: - Sin! - Brother!
translation.ja: 罪だ 何が起きたの？

translation.en: Sin!
translation.ja: これは罪だ

translation.en: - Thomasin, take the children outside. - No!
translation.ja: トマシン 双子を外へ

translation.en: Who does this to thee? Who does this?
translation.ja: 誰が お前を苦しめてるの？

translation.en: His mouth is sealed up.
translation.ja: 口が開かない

translation.en: God!
translation.ja: 神様

translation.en: William!
translation.ja: ウィル

translation.en: William.
translation.ja: 何とかして

translation.en: - Caleb. - Hold him.
translation.ja: 支えてろ

translation.en: Children, away from this. Thomasin, help!
translation.ja: トマシン 双子と外へ出ろ

translation.en: - Caleb! - Caleb.
translation.ja: ケイレブ！

translation.en: He'll break his jaws.
translation.ja: 歯を食い縛ってる

translation.en: Mother!
translation.ja: 母さん

translation.en: What is't?
translation.ja: 何なの？

translation.en: William,
translation.ja: ウィル

translation.en: he is witched!
translation.ja: 魔女の呪いよ

translation.en: - 'Tis she! - No!
translation.ja: 彼女だよ やめて

translation.en: - What horrible fancy's this? - She told me she stole Sam!
translation.ja: どういうこと？ 彼女がサムを…

translation.en: Silence.
translation.ja: 黙れ

translation.en: - She gave him to the Devil in the wood. - They lie!
translation.ja: 悪魔に渡した ウソよ

translation.en: What say you?
translation.ja: 何ですって？

translation.en: She turned Flora's milk to blood! She had bade us keep secret from you!
translation.ja: フローラの乳を血に変えた

translation.en: It was but a jest to quiet her. I...
translation.ja: 本気にしないで 悪魔と取引したんだ

translation.en: - She made bargain with Satan! - She signed his book!
translation.ja: 悪魔と取引したんだ 契約したの

translation.en: Silence!
translation.ja: うるさい！

translation.en: Don't let her near me. She'll place a curse on me!
translation.ja: 助けて　呪われる

translation.en: - They conspire against me. - Thomasin is a witch!
translation.ja: でたらめだわ 彼女は魔女よ

translation.en: Nay. I'll not hear it.
translation.ja: お前たちは黙ってろ

translation.en: I'll have proof, or heaven help thee.
translation.ja: 私が直接 問いただす

translation.en: On thy knees!
translation.ja: ひざまずけ

translation.en: Look me in the eye, daughter.
translation.ja: 私の目を見ろ

translation.en: - Dost thou love the word of God? - Yes.
translation.ja: 神を愛してるか？ はい

translation.en: Love you the Bible? Love you prayer?
translation.ja: 聖書と祈りは？

translation.en: Yes. Yes!
translation.ja: 愛しています

translation.en: We are children of sin all,
translation.ja: 我らは罪を背負ってる

translation.en: yet I tell thee, I have raised up no witch in this house!
translation.ja: だが私は 魔女を育てた覚えはない

translation.en: Let us pray,
translation.ja: 祈ろう

translation.en: then we need fear nothing.
translation.ja: 恐れを消すんだ

translation.en: We shall never lie open to the wicked one.
translation.ja: 悪魔に負けてはならん

translation.en: Pray for thy brother.
translation.ja: 弟のために祈れ

translation.en: - You must believe us. - Evil wretches!
translation.ja: 魔女は… 黙れ！

translation.en: - Thomasin! - Thomasin!
translation.ja: トマシン

translation.en: Pray.
translation.ja: 祈れ

translation.en: Our Father, which art in heaven, hallowed be thy name, thy kingdom come...
translation.ja: 天にまします我らの父よ 願わくは…

translation.en: Jonas, pray.
translation.ja: ジョナス 祈って

translation.en: I... I cannot remember my prayer.
translation.ja: 祈りを思い出せない

translation.en: - What? - Nor I.
translation.ja: 何て？ 私もよ

translation.en: I cannot.
translation.ja: 言葉が出ない

translation.en: What nonsense is this?
translation.ja: バカ言わないで

translation.en: Speak, children.
translation.ja: 祈りなさい

translation.en: Our Father, which art in heaven, hallowed be thy name...
translation.ja: 天におられます… 我らの父よ　願わくは…

translation.en: - Please, stop it. - Pray.
translation.ja: お願い やめて 祈って

translation.en: - Stop it! - Pray, you beasts.
translation.ja: やめて 祈るのよ

translation.en: - Get on thy knees and pray! - Damnation!
translation.ja: ひざをついて 罰当たりめ

translation.en: Please, stop!
translation.ja: お願い　やめて

translation.en: I cannot hear this. This is not so!
translation.ja: 黙って　聞きたくない

translation.en: A toad.
translation.ja: ヒキガエル

translation.en: A cat.
translation.ja: 猫

translation.en: A crow.
translation.ja: カラス

translation.en: A raven.
translation.ja: オオガラス

translation.en: A great black dog.
translation.ja: 黒い犬

translation.en: A wolf.
translation.ja: 狼

translation.en: She desires of my blood.
translation.ja: 彼女が血を求めて…

translation.en: She desires of my blood.
translation.ja: 血を求めて…

translation.en: - Sends 'em upon me! - She desires of my blood.
translation.ja: ヤツらを送ってくる

translation.en: - They feed upon her teats... - She desires of my blood. ...her nether parts!
translation.ja: ヤツらは彼女の 乳房と陰部を吸っている

translation.en: She sends 'em upon me!
translation.ja: ヤツらが僕を襲いに来る

translation.en: My Lord, my Jesus, save me!
translation.ja: 神様 イエス様 僕をお救いください

translation.en: - Think on Christ! - She sends her devils!
translation.ja: 主よ！ 悪魔が来る

translation.en: I am thine enemy, wallowing in the blood and filth of my sins!
translation.ja: 僕は あなたの敵 血と罪に まみれている

translation.en: - The Lord is my shepherd... - I am thine enemy!
translation.ja: “主は私の羊飼い”

translation.en: - ...I shall not want. - He maketh me lie down - in green pasture... - And leadeth me by the still waters.
translation.ja: “私を緑の牧場(まきば)に横たえ…”

translation.en: He restoreth my soul and leadeth me in the paths of righteousness - for his name's sake. - I am thine enemy!
translation.ja: “私の魂を よみがえらせ 正しい道に導きます”

translation.en: Yea, though I should walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil...
translation.ja: “死の陰の谷を歩く時も 私は恐れない”

translation.en: For thou art with me!
translation.ja: “主がおられるから”

translation.en: Caleb.
translation.ja: ケイレブ

translation.en: Cast the light of countenance upon me.
translation.ja: 御顔(みかお)の光で僕を照らし

translation.en: Spread over me the lap of thy love.
translation.ja: 主の愛を お与えください

translation.en: Wash me in the ever- flowing fountains of thy blood.
translation.ja: あなたの血で 僕を清めてください

translation.en: Wholly thine I am, my sweet Lord Jesus.
translation.ja: イエス様 僕は あなたのものです

translation.en: My Lord, my love, kiss me with the kisses of thy mouth.
translation.ja: 心から敬愛する主よ どうか口づけをください

translation.en: How lovely art thou. Thy embrace.
translation.ja: なんて素晴らしい 抱擁でしょう

translation.en: My Lord!
translation.ja: 主よ

translation.en: My Lord, my love!
translation.ja: 愛する主よ

translation.en: My soul's salvation. Take me to thy lap!
translation.ja: 僕の魂を救い おそばに お迎えください

translation.en: Caleb.
translation.ja: ケイレブ

translation.en: Caleb.
translation.ja: ケイレブ

translation.en: Caleb.
translation.ja: ケイレブ

translation.en: Wake up, please. Wake up.
translation.ja: 起きて　目を開けて

translation.en: Wake up. Wake up!
translation.ja: 目を覚ましてよ

translation.en: No, please...
translation.ja: お願い

translation.en: He is dead!
translation.ja: 死んでしまった

translation.en: He is dead!
translation.ja: 死んでしまったわ

translation.en: Jonas, Mercy, get up.
translation.ja: ジョナス マーシー

translation.en: Get up!
translation.ja: 起きなさい

translation.en: Get away from him! Get thee gone!
translation.ja: この子に触らないで 出てって！

translation.en: Thomasin.
translation.ja: トマシン

translation.en: Thomasin, Thomasin. My girl.
translation.ja: トマシン 落ち着きなさい

translation.en: This tree will be lovely come spring.
translation.ja: 春になれば木が芽吹く

translation.en: Do you remember when we came hither?
translation.ja: 今年のようにな

translation.en: Such a pretty tree.
translation.ja: 美しくなる

translation.en: Next year I'd have sown us a wheat field.
translation.ja: 来年は小麦を育てよう

translation.en: Started at this tree and ended thither. We'd have been a proper farm then.
translation.ja: この木から向こうまで 畑にするんだ

translation.en: Bought us a big fat milk cow,
translation.ja: 丸々とした乳牛も飼う

translation.en: finished us the barn...
translation.ja: 納屋も必要だな

translation.en: You must tell me, Thomasin.
translation.ja: 正直に言ってくれ

translation.en: Tomorrow, I cannot keep secret of this.
translation.ja: 明日 私は評議会と話す

translation.en: A council will be called, and thy life is...
translation.ja: このことを隠してはおけん

translation.en: - Thy life... - Will you not believe me?
translation.ja: このことを隠してはおけん 私を魔女だと？

translation.en: I saw the serpent in my son. You stopped their prayers.
translation.ja: 双子の祈りを 遮ったのは お前だ

translation.en: They lie.
translation.ja: 彼らのウソだわ

translation.en: I saw it. Caleb disappeared with thee.
translation.ja: ケイレブは お前と森に行き 消えた

translation.en: - I love Caleb. - And who then found him,
translation.ja: 実の弟よ そして お前が―

translation.en: pale as death, naked as sin and witched?
translation.ja: 呪われたケイレブを見つけた

translation.en: Thomasin, listen to me, the bargain thou hast made is of no effect.
translation.ja: よく聞け 悪魔に魂を売っても無駄だ

translation.en: - I made no bargain. - Thy soul belongeth to Christ.
translation.ja: 売ってない 魂は神のものだ

translation.en: - I made no bargain. - The Devil hath no interest in thee.
translation.ja: 契約してない 悪魔は冷淡だぞ

translation.en: - I am no witch, Father. - What did I but see in my house?
translation.ja: 魔女じゃない ケイレブを呪ったろ？

translation.en: - Will you not hear me? - I prithee, confess.
translation.ja: 違うのに… 告白しろ

translation.en: Why have you turned against me?
translation.ja: なぜ私を否定するの？

translation.en: Christ can unwitch us if you will but speak truth to me.
translation.ja: 真実を話せば 主が呪いを解く

translation.en: As I love thee, speak truth.
translation.ja: 私は お前を愛してるんだ

translation.en: You ask me to speak truth?
translation.ja: 真実を知りたい？

translation.en: I beg thee.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: You and Mother are planned to rid the farm of me.
translation.ja: 私を追い出すって―

translation.en: Aye. I heard you speak of it. Is that truth?
translation.ja: 父さんが母さんに 話すのを聞いたわ

translation.en: You took of Mother's cup and let her rail at me. You confessed not till it was too late.
translation.ja: コップのことも 私が 責められてるのに黙ってた

translation.en: - Is that truth? - Peace, thee.
translation.ja: 違う？ 黙れ

translation.en: - I will not. - I am thy father.
translation.ja: 嫌よ 無礼だぞ

translation.en: You are a hypocrite!
translation.ja: この偽善者！

translation.en: Hold thy tongue, daughter mine!
translation.ja: 口を慎め

translation.en: You took Caleb to the wood, and let me take the blame of that, too. Is that truth?
translation.ja: ケイレブが森に行ったのは 父さんのせいよ

translation.en: You let Mother be as thy master.
translation.ja: 妻に頭が上がらず―

translation.en: You cannot bring the crops to yield! You cannot hunt!
translation.ja: 作物の栽培も狩りも 満足にできない男よ

translation.en: - Is that truth enough? - Enough.
translation.ja: 作物の栽培も狩りも 満足にできない男よ やめろ

translation.en: Thou canst do nothing save cut wood!
translation.ja: 無能な人間だわ

translation.en: Bitch!
translation.ja: 貴様！

translation.en: And you will not hear me!
translation.ja: 娘の話すら信じない

translation.en: Must I hear the Devil wag his tongue in thy mouth?
translation.ja: 今のは悪魔が言わせたのか？

translation.en: Ask the twins then.
translation.ja: 双子に聞けば？

translation.en: Go on, ask them. They spend all day long babbling to that horned beast.
translation.ja: ２人ともヤギと話せるから 答えを知ってるはずよ

translation.en: - They know well his voice. - Go to.
translation.ja: ２人ともヤギと話せるから 答えを知ってるはずよ 何だと？

translation.en: The Adversary oft comes in the shape of a he- goat. And whispers. Aye, whispers!
translation.ja: 悪魔はヤギに姿を変えて 言葉を ささやくんでしょ？

translation.en: He is Lucifer. You know it.
translation.ja: ２人は黒ヤギが ルシファーだと知ってる

translation.en: - The twins know it. - Slander thy brethren no more.
translation.ja: ２人は黒ヤギが ルシファーだと知ってる いい加減にしろ

translation.en: It is they!
translation.ja: 彼らが魔女よ

translation.en: From my sight.
translation.ja: もう よせ

translation.en: 'Twas they and that goat what bewitched this whole farm.
translation.ja: 彼らとヤギが呪った

translation.en: Lies.
translation.ja: ウソだ

translation.en: Was't a wolf stole Sam?
translation.ja: 狼がサムを奪った？

translation.en: I never saw no wolf.
translation.ja: どこに狼がいると？

translation.en: Mercy told me herself by the stream, I be the Witch of the Wood.
translation.ja: マーシーは自分で 森の魔女だと言った

translation.en: Get up. Rise!
translation.ja: 立て 来い！

translation.en: - What is this? - Speak.
translation.ja: 何事？ 説明しろ

translation.en: I am no witch.
translation.ja: 私は無実よ

translation.en: Get her from me sight. I'll not have her in this house.
translation.ja: この子を家に入れないで

translation.en: She is no witch, Katherine.
translation.ja: 彼女は魔女じゃない

translation.en: What is the cause, daughter? Tell thy mother.
translation.ja: 母さんにも話してやれ

translation.en: I cannot know for certain.
translation.ja: でも確かじゃない

translation.en: Thou toldst me well thou knew!
translation.ja: 真実なんだろ？

translation.en: I cannot look at her.
translation.ja: 追い出して

translation.en: Aye, but y'shall. Thomasin?
translation.ja: 双子の話をしろ

translation.en: Thomasin!
translation.ja: トマシン

translation.en: Jonas and Mercy, they made covenant with the Devil in the shape of Black Phillip.
translation.ja: 黒ヤギに変身した悪魔と 双子が契約したの

translation.en: Dost hear that?
translation.ja: 聞いたか？

translation.en: Ye black minions? Dost hear that, yolk devils?
translation.ja: お前たちは 悪魔の手下になったのか？

translation.en: Wake!
translation.ja: 起きろ

translation.en: Wake from this!
translation.ja: 目を覚ませ

translation.en: Did ye make some unholy bond with that goat? Speak if this be pretense!
translation.ja: お前たちは罪深い契約を ヤギと交わしたのか？

translation.en: Dissemblers. Grave pretenders all.
translation.ja: よくも親を だませたものだ

translation.en: Hear me this. I will not play a fool to children's games.
translation.ja: これ以上 子供の遊びには付き合えん

translation.en: This is no sport, William.
translation.ja: これは遊びじゃない

translation.en: Yet these lies from our babes' mouths are but trifles to them.
translation.ja: 我が子たちは 偽証の罪を恐れんのか

translation.en: - I do not lie! - Silence, creature!
translation.ja: 私は違う 黙れ この悪童め

translation.en: Thy son is dead. Damned!
translation.ja: 息子は地獄に落ちたわ

translation.en: - Caleb did but cry Jesus. - The Devil!
translation.ja: 最期に主が来た 悪魔よ

translation.en: - Thou know it not! - The Devil will speak the Scripture, too.
translation.ja: 違う 悪魔が主を騙(かた)った

translation.en: Thou know it not! 'Tis not true!
translation.ja: それは絶対にない

translation.en: - We are damned! - Wake!
translation.ja: 全員 呪われた 起きろ

translation.en: Fetch the billhook, wife,
translation.ja: 鎌を持ってこい

translation.en: and I will smite Jonas as Abraham would have done his seed.
translation.ja: 私はアブラハムの仕事を やり遂げる

translation.en: - No. Stop it! Stop it! - Fetch the billhook,
translation.ja: やめて こいつの頭を かち割ってやる

translation.en: and I will dash his skull!
translation.ja: こいつの頭を かち割ってやる

translation.en: - Do you see? - Stop it.
translation.ja: ほらね？

translation.en: Do you see now?
translation.ja: 悪魔の叫びだわ

translation.en: Please you, Father? No, it is not safe. Not with them!
translation.ja: お願い 双子と一緒にしないで

translation.en: Keep me from this goat.
translation.ja: ヤギの近くも嫌

translation.en: If that old billy be the Devil, I would have danced with him myself.
translation.ja: ヤギが悪魔なら 私は とうに呪われてる

translation.en: I'll break thee out upon the dawn, and we'll set back to the plantation.
translation.ja: 明日の朝になったら 出してやる

translation.en: Think on thy sins.
translation.ja: 罪を悔いて待て

translation.en: Are you witches?
translation.ja: ２人は魔女？

translation.en: Does Father think I am?
translation.ja: 父さんは何て？

translation.en: Are you?
translation.ja: あんたは？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: 違う

translation.en: Doth he really speak to thee?
translation.ja: ヤギは口を利くの？

translation.en: It is my fault.
translation.ja: 私のせいだ

translation.en: I confess it.
translation.ja: 告白します

translation.en: I confess it.
translation.ja: お聞きください

translation.en: O my God,
translation.ja: 神よ 私は―

translation.en: I am false.
translation.ja: 過ちを犯しました

translation.en: I am infected with the filth of pride.
translation.ja: 私は とても傲慢(ごうまん)な人間です

translation.en: I know it. I am.
translation.ja: 自分の罪を自覚しています

translation.en: Dispose of me how thou wilt,
translation.ja: 私は どんな罰も 受けますが―

translation.en: yet redeem my children.
translation.ja: 子供たちは お赦しを…

translation.en: They cannot tame their natural evils.
translation.ja: 彼らは ただ未熟なのです

translation.en: I lie before thee a coward
translation.ja: 私は ひれ伏します 弱い心と―

translation.en: and thine enemy,
translation.ja: 背信の罪に―

translation.en: and I'll lick the dust of thine earth.
translation.ja: 頭(こうべ)を深く垂れています

translation.en: I beg thee,
translation.ja: 子供たちを―

translation.en: save my children.
translation.ja: お救いください

translation.en: I beg thee, my Christ,
translation.ja: 主イエスよ お願いです

translation.en: I have not damned my family!
translation.ja: 彼らは大切な家族なのです

translation.en: My lambs.
translation.ja: 戻ったのね

translation.en: Me angels.
translation.ja: 私の天使たち

translation.en: Mother, we have longed to see you so.
translation.ja: 母さん すごく会いたかった

translation.en: As I to thee.
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: I must wake thy father. He will be so glad.
translation.ja: 父さんを起こしてくる すごく喜ぶわよ

translation.en: No, let him sleep.
translation.ja: いや 起こさないで

translation.en: We would see you oft, Mother.
translation.ja: これから何度も会えるよ

translation.en: - Would that please you? - Aye.
translation.ja: うれしい？ ええ

translation.en: I have brought a book for you, Mother.
translation.ja: 母さんに本を持ってきた

translation.en: - Will you look at it with me? - Aye.
translation.ja: 一緒に見よう そうね

translation.en: One moment now. Samuel is hungry.
translation.ja: でも待って サムが おなかをすかせてる

translation.en: Come, come, little Sam.
translation.ja: サム お乳よ

translation.en: Flora? Flora?
translation.ja: フローラ どうしたの？

translation.en: Corruption, thou art my father.
translation.ja: “穴に言う あなたは我が父だと”

translation.en: What hast thou done?
translation.ja: 何てことしたの

translation.en: Where are they?
translation.ja: 双子はどこ？

translation.en: - I know not what I saw... - Where are they?
translation.ja: 知らない どこなの？

translation.en: I did nothing. She came from the sky, she...
translation.ja: 魔女が空から来て…

translation.en: Devil!
translation.ja: お前よ

translation.en: You have their blood upon thy hands!
translation.ja: お前が みんなを殺した

translation.en: It is you.
translation.ja: やっぱり魔女だった

translation.en: - It is you! - I am your daughter!
translation.ja: やっぱり魔女だった 母さんの娘よ

translation.en: The Devil is in thee and hath had thee.
translation.ja: お前は悪魔に魂を売って―

translation.en: You are smeared of his sin.
translation.ja: 罪に汚(けが)れている

translation.en: You reek of evil!
translation.ja: 私には分かる 悪魔と契約したのね

translation.en: - You have made a covenant with death! - Mother!
translation.ja: 私には分かる 悪魔と契約したのね 母さん

translation.en: You bewitched thy brother, proud slut!
translation.ja: お前は弟を誘惑したんでしょ

translation.en: Did you not think I saw thy sluttish looks to him,
translation.ja: ふしだらな目で 売春婦のように

translation.en: bewitching his eye as any whore?
translation.ja: あの子を たぶらかした

translation.en: - What say you to me? - And thy father next!
translation.ja: やめて 次に父親を誘惑した

translation.en: No. No, Mother.
translation.ja: そんなことしてない

translation.en: You took them from me. - They are gone. - No.
translation.ja: お前が私から みんなを奪ったのよ

translation.en: - You killed my children! - No! No!
translation.ja: お前は私の子供たちを殺し

translation.en: You killed thy father! You witch!
translation.ja: 自分の父親を殺した

translation.en: I love you! I love you!
translation.ja: 母さん 愛してる

translation.en: Black Phillip.
translation.ja: ブラック･フィリップ

translation.en: I conjure thee to speak to me.
translation.ja: しゃべってちょうだい

translation.en: Speak as thou dost speak to Jonas and Mercy.
translation.ja: 双子に話したように…

translation.en: Dost thou understand my English tongue?
translation.ja: 私の言葉が分かる？

translation.en: Answer me.
translation.ja: 答えて

translation.en: What dost thou want?
translation.ja: お前の望みを言ってみろ

translation.en: What canst thou give?
translation.ja: 何をくれるの？

translation.en: Wouldst thou like the taste of butter?
translation.ja: バターを 味わってみるのはどうだ？

translation.en: A pretty dress?
translation.ja: きれいなドレスは？

translation.en: Wouldst thou like to live deliciously?
translation.ja: 魅惑的な暮らしも 与えてやろうか？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: Wouldst thou like to see the world?
translation.ja: 世界も見せてやろう

translation.en: What will you from me?
translation.ja: 私は何をすれば？

translation.en: Dost thou see a book before thee?
translation.ja: 目の前に 本が置いてあるだろう？

translation.en: Remove thy shift.
translation.ja: 服を脱いで署名しろ

translation.en: I cannot write my name.
translation.ja: 字を知らないの

translation.en: I will guide thy hand.
translation.ja: 私が手を貸してやろう
